div.h2:
Distance Learning Plan /
Enseñanza a Distancia
div.h5:
DCB will require that students complete home learning packets during distance learning time. Download Below.
DCB requiere que sus estudiantes completen los paquetes de aprendizaje durante la enseñanza a distancia. Descargue abajo.

div.h2:
Head of School Communication /
Comunicación de la Directora Ejecutiva
div.p:
Mayor Muriel Bowser announcement – 4/17/20
English | Spanish

Extended Closure, Enrollment Process, & PTA Announcement – 4/15/20
English | Spanish

Distance Learning Packets, Enrollment Update, & Community Connections – 4/09/20
English | Spanish

We are staying connected with our DC Bilingual family! – 4/01/20
English | Spanish

Extended Closure, Distance Learning, & Ways to Support – 3/24/20
English | Spanish

DC Bilingual Updates and Resources for COVID-19 – 3/16/20
English | Spanish

Coronavirus Update, Spelling Bee & Step Afrika Performance – 3/11/20
English | Spanish

Staff Transition, Black History Celebrations, & Illness Prevention – 3/4/20
English | Spanish

p.strong: DC Mutual Aid Network Facebook page 4/7/20

div.div: Facebook Live kids yoga with health coach Kaydee Dahlin. 3/20/20
div.p: Kids & Culture Camp inspires children to love learning, embrace culture, and live mindfully. With over 10 years of providing educational enrichment programs for children, KCC has launched 45-minute online cultural sessions to assist parents in helping their children stay engaged during this time. 3/18/20

div.div: The DCB Parent Resource Page contains information on free food options for students and families and links to online educational and exercise activities. Parents are encouraged to add to this page. 3/17/20
div.p:
For up to date city-wide information, please see DC Health – 3/13/20
Read More

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey vc_custom_1585407082941 vc_custom_1585407082941

div.h3: During our school and city’s closure, DC Bilingual is committed to support our families who need it most with academic, social, and emotional resources, as well as linkages to the many other organizations in our city working with us on the frontline. Help us to extend our reach – donate today.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-primary

div.div:
Address: 33 Riggs Road, NE Washington DC 20011
Phone: 202.750.6674
Fax: 202.750.6733
Email: info@dcbilingual.org

h4.a: - The Middle States Association announces DC Bilingual’s Accreditation for another seven years!
- Access to Schools that Level the Playing Field for DC’s At-Risk Students features DC Bilingual
